name: safeScroll DX
description: allows blurring or hiding of media and text from certain blogs or posts with certain tags

blogAvatars.title: blur or hide avatars in filtered posts

media.title: blur or hide media in filtered posts

text.title: blur or hide text in filtered posts

rebloggedFrom.title: filter posts reblogged from listed blogs

root.title: filter posts where the original poster is a listed blog

trail.title: filter posts containing listed blogs in the reblog trail

tagList.title: comma-separated list of tags to filter
